document.full_text: defenseman duncan keith had two goals and two assists and chicago stayed alive in its stanley cup title defense, routing vancouver, 5-0, to cut the canucks' series lead to 3-2.
document.title: hockey roundup: blackhawks rout canucks to stave off elimination
lines_and_colors: defenseman duncan keith had two goals and two assists and chicago stayed alive in its stanley cup title defense, routing vancouver, 5-0, to cut the canucks' series lead to 3-2.
